name: Slide to side
description:
Made for  GeoJam2022!

You're a cube that's undergone terrible experiments! And now you can pick a side to expand except down because that breaks everything. Though at least you have science bro to guide you through the tests.

And if you manage to do something that feels cheaty but you don't die from it, I call that a tech not a glitch and I have noticed several places you can apply knowledge to break the level, they are no longer bugs, they are features. However the game is completeably playing normally.

And I appologise for the music just being synths... I am not good at anything but synths

Controls

  • WASD - Movement in all directions
  • Space/Controller A button - Jump
  • Left/Right arrow keys/dpad - Swaps face you are extending
  • Up/Down arrow keys/dpad - Extends/retracts that face
  • Q/E & Controller right stick - Moves camera from left to right
  • Esc/Start - Exits the game

Of note the arrow keys/dpad will not work if another arrow key/dpad button is already held down to prevent anything bad happening.

All assets are mine, with the help of some Brackeys tutorials of course

If it's not running check if your browser has WebGL 2.

For further technical insight as well as in development videos, the github can be found here

Hint: Level 4 is beaten using the up direction and jumping, that is all the hint I'll give.  Hopefully in future when I can better get a hang if dialogue in games I'll Add some for science bro to tell you these things
